A version of '''Indev 0.31''' was released on '''February 2, 2010''', at 21:57 UTC.<ref>Miclee's logs: "[16:58] <Notch> ok, all the old models are in the game now, yay"</ref> It was announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 23:27 UTC.<ref>{{link |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140427012048/http://notch.tumblr.com/post/367646413/ |title=No functioning mobs today, unfortunately |website=The Word of Notch |date=February 2, 2010}}</ref><ref group="note">While some sources imply that this version was released on February 3, it was actually released at 23:27 UTC on February 2 (which is 00:27 on February 3, Sweden time)</ref>

This version was reuploaded for the first time at 23:11 UTC.<ref>{{Cite IRC log|DBN|tz=standard|"P5:11:23 <Notch> indev's been updated again"}}</ref>

This version was soon reuploaded for the second time at 23:26 UTC (1 minute before update is announced).<ref>{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796649-a-secret-update|title=A secret update?|author=Farrone|website=Minecraft Forum|date=February 2, 2010}}</ref>

This version was reuploaded for the final time at 23:30 UTC for fixing loading bug.<ref>{{Cite IRC log|DBN|tz=standard|"P5:30:39 <Notch> i uploaded a fix to the loading bug"}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Lava JE6.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Pushes out items.
* No longer generates on the surface of Normal themed worlds.

'''{{Animate|Coal Ore JE1 BE1.png;Iron Ore JE1 BE1.png;Gold Ore JE2 BE1.png;Diamond Ore JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Ore]]s'''
* No longer requires a [[pickaxe]] to break the block, although a pickaxe breaks it much faster.<ref group="note" name="gameplay_evidence" />
** Once again possible to mine ores with anything and not just with a [[pickaxe]].
** Mineral blocks (iron, gold, diamond) are treated similarly to their corresponding ores.

'''[[File:Stone JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Stone]]'''
* No longer requires a [[pickaxe]] to break the block, although a pickaxe breaks it much faster.<ref group="note" name="gameplay_evidence" />
** Once again possible to mine stone with anything and not just with a [[pickaxe]].

'''[[File:TNT JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[TNT]]'''
* Now hurts mobs.
** Items are still safe from TNT explosions.
* Pushes away entities.

'''[[File:Water JE6.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Generates splash particles when the player is swimming in it.

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* No longer destroyed in fire or lava.
* Shadows display under dropped items.
* No longer go into hidden inventory slots once a save is reloaded.

'''{{Animate|Wooden Sword JE1 BE1.png; Stone Sword JE1 BE1.png; Iron Sword JE1 BE1.png; Golden Sword JE1.png; Diamond Sword JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Sword]]s'''
* Deals less damage.

'''[[Tool]]s'''
* Harder materials no longer require better tools.<ref group="note" name="gameplay_evidence">This has been verified during gameplay of this page's client jar, dated February 2, 2010 23:31 UTC.</ref>
* Mining underwater or in the air is now slower.
* Mining tools can now hit mobs. Their damage depends on the type and tier of tool.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''General'''
* Changed the pickup animation for arrows and dropped items.
** They now get sucked up when the player walks into them.

=== General ===
'''Splash'''
* Depending on the length of the splash, it changes size in accordance to the default resolution.

== Technical ==
=== General ===
'''[[Debug screen]]'''
* Added "E" (Entity count), "P" (Particle count), and "LT" (number of chests).
** "LT" have two value:
*** The first value of "LT" seemingly is unaffected by this.
*** The second value of "LT" would go up every time a chest is placed.

== Removals ==
'''[[File:Steve JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Mob (entity)|Mob]]'''
* Removed.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Flowers no longer spawn with dirt under them.
* Standing with the player's head inside non-solid blocks no longer causes extreme fog.

== Bugs ==

* Under some circumstances, the game is completely black, but still playable.
